meanings.sent1: The haunted house was the ghostiest place in town.
meanings.sent2: The fog made the forest look ghostiest in the moonlight.
meanings.sent3: The ghostiest costume at the party was a white sheet with eye holes.
meanings.sent4: Her pale face and eerie smile made her the ghostiest figure in the room.
meanings.sent5: The ghostiest sound in the old mansion was the creaking of the stairs at midnight.

meanings.definition: Most resembling or characteristic of a ghost.
meanings.sent1: The ghostiest figure in the painting seemed to move when you looked away.
meanings.sent2: The abandoned graveyard had the ghostiest atmosphere on a foggy evening.
meanings.sent3: The ghostiest part of the movie was when the spirit appeared in the mirror.
meanings.sent4: Her whisper was so ghostiest, it sent shivers down my spine.
meanings.sent5: The ghostiest feeling crept over me as I walked through the dark, empty hallway.
